scripts.demo: npx kill-port 3003 || true && npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 3003 -c-1
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push origin main
scripts.tagversion: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const d=new Date(); const ts=d.toLocaleString('en-GB',{year:'numeric',month:'short',day:'2-digit',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit',hour12:true}).replace(',',''); try{execSync(`git tag -a v${v} -m \"Release v${v} at ${ts}\"`,{stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e){console.log('Tag v'+v+' already exists. Skipping.')}"
scripts.tagversionpush: npm run tagversion && git push origin --tags
